title: What is HTML?
content: The HyperText Markup Language, or HTML(HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

title: What is JavaScript?
content: It's an object-oriented computer programming language commonly used to create interactive effects within web browsers.

title: What is CSS?
content: CSS stands for cascading styling sheet and the main purpose is to give a website an attractive look.

title: What is Handlebars?
content: Handlebars is a simple templating language. It uses a template and an input object to generate HTML or other text formats
